values: 南方；南部；南边；南侧；南面；南端；南部方向；（South）[桥牌]坐在南首位置的人；（the ~）（南半球的）发展中国家；美国南方；美国南方各州
朝南的；南方的；位于南方的；南部的；南侧的；南向的；向南的；南端的
向南方；朝南；南下；往南方；朝向南方；向着南方
南行；使朝南；使面向南方；往南走；南下；（天体）向南走；向南转动；转向南方

word_group.brief_definition: 南非的；南非人的；南非人
(尤指英格兰)往南方, 在南方

bilingual.source: It will be hot in the south.
In the south, it will be fine.
But those in the south are salty.
Our manager is on holiday in the south.
bilingual.target: 我们经理正在南方度假。

bilingual.source: From Africa to slavery to the South to Harlem, she thought.
bilingual.target: 她想，从非洲到奴隶制，再到南方，再到哈莱姆。

bilingual.source: Right away, she saw that two murals showed her people's history in the South.
bilingual.target: 她立刻看到两幅壁画展示了她的人民在南方的历史。

bilingual.source: I like the food in the south.
The wind is blowing from the south today.

bilingual.target: 鸟类在冬季迁移到南方。

bilingual.source: We plan to go on vacation to the south.

list.abstract: south（英 [saʊθ]，美 [saʊθ]），英语单词，作名词时，为南；南部；坐在南首位置的人。作形容词时，为位于南方的；靠近南方的；朝南的。作副词时，为向南方；朝南；低于。作动词时，为朝南移动；穿过子午线。短语搭配有South Africa（南非）、South African（南非的）。例句为“It flows south into the Gulf of Mexico.（它向南流入墨西哥湾。）” south相关近义词有austral，相关反义词有north。

yingyinNormal.en: South America. It's like America, but South.
yingyinNormal.zh: 南美洲，好像美洲，不过是在南方的。

yingyinNormal.en: The landed gentry of the south prepare to meet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 南方的地主正准备商谈。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, if the presents are hidden south for the winter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果礼物藏在南方过冬的话。

yingyinNormal.en: Now the south has been subdued, and our forces are fully armed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今南方已定，兵甲已足，

yingyinNormal.en: We can, blind man, because the Old Man is dead! Our demons lie south!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们承受的起，瞎子，因为长者已经死了！我们的对手在南方！

yingyinNormal.en: What the hell are you talking about, "The south will rise again man." Yes, money well spent.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在胡说什么？“南方将会再起”。对，那笔钱花得很值得。

yingyinNormal.en: Frostwolves, you are a practical people. Those of us from the south have always admired that about you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 霜狼，你是一个务实的人，我们这些从南方来的总是羡慕你们的这些。

yingyinNormal.en: That priest is from South China. How do we know he does not have grandchildren behind those walls down there?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个术士是南方人，我们怎么知道他是不是为了保护他的子孙才说出那番话来？

yingyinNormal.en: My war is with South China, not with my wife and Empress. You know I heed your wisdom, but there's no more waiting!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是要和南方打仗，不是要和你吵嘴，你知道我尊重你的意见，但我已等不下去了。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you take dance lessons? Against my will, in the South, preadolescent children are forced through a process called cotillion, which indoctrinates them with all the social graces and dance skills needed to function in 18th century Vienna.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你上过舞蹈课吗？虽然我不情愿，但在南方，未成年孩童都要强制上沙龙舞课程，灌输他们必须的社交风度和舞蹈技能，以适应18世纪的维也纳。

yingyinNormal.en: From the remote mountains Hani to the multitude Han in the cities of the east, from the Dai of the steamy South to the desert dwelling Uygur, China's culture and customs hidden from view for thousands of years are slowly being revealed to the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从远山之中的哈尼族到东部城市中人口众多的汉族，从生活在南方水乡的傣族到以大漠为家的维吾尔族，中国数千年来神秘的文化和风俗正在为世界所了解。

yingyinNormal.en: You were staring about eight inches south of there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看着南面8公分外的地方。

yingyinNormal.en: To South Carolina? When I want a job, I do my homework.
yingyinNormal.zh: 跑到南卡罗莱纳？应聘就得做好准备工作。

yingyinNormal.en: The Great Kublai Khan is interested in peace with South China.
yingyinNormal.zh: 忽必烈大汗有意和中原南部和平交好。

yingyinNormal.en: London is situated in the South-East of England in the Thames Valley.
yingyinNormal.zh: 伦敦位于英格兰的东南部，在泰晤士河上。

yingyinNormal.en: Tensions between your nation and South Korea are at an all-time high.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的国家和南韩之间一直保持着紧张的局势。

yingyinNormal.en: Supply lines here. While the Eastern Sea hems them in both south and east.
yingyinNormal.zh: 补给线在这里，同时在东部海岸的从南部和东部包围他们。

yingyinNormal.en: Not really. Only a matter of time before the South Africans see the light.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那倒未必，南非那边早晚会想通的。

yingyinNormal.en: Energon detectors have been triggered as far away as South America and China.
yingyinNormal.zh: 南美和中国能量检测设备都被触发。

yingyinNormal.en: Singapore is situated in South East Asia, just off the southern tip of Malaysia.
yingyinNormal.zh: 新加坡是个东南亚国家，地处马来西亚岛南端。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 南; 南边的; 向南

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 在南方的；向南方的；朝南方的；生活在南方的；源于南方的；从南面吹来的；南方的；南方居民的；有南方特点的

word_family.mean: n. 南；南部；坐在南首位置的人；英格兰南部；美国南部各州；南方；南方不发达国家

sense_info_list.zh: 南; 南边的; 向南

examination_example.sentence: Completed in 1875, the State Department's <highlight>south</highlight> wing was the first to be occupied, with its elegant four-story library, Diplomatic Reception Room, and Secretary's office.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 完工于1875年的国务院南翼是第一个投入使用的，它有优雅的四层楼图书馆、外交接待室和国务卿办公室。

examination_example.sentence: In the meantime, thriving Spanish colonies had been established in Mexico, the West Indies, and <highlight>South</highlight> America.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与此同时，西班牙在墨西哥、西印度群岛和南美洲建立了繁荣的殖民地。

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>South</highlight> Africa, an HIV-prevention initiative known as LoveLife recruits young people to promote safe sex among their peers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在南非，一项名为“爱生活”的艾滋病毒预防倡议招募年轻人在同龄人中推广安全性行为。

word_usage.usage: South Africa指“南非”这一个国家，而Southern Africa指的是“南部非洲”，是一个地理概念，包含了几个国家。

examination_example.sentence: Native to the <highlight>South</highlight> Pacific and Indian Ocean, the potentially deadly fish has poisonous hooks and a painful sting capable of killing people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种鱼原产于南太平洋和印度洋，有致命的潜在危险，它有有毒的鱼钩和能使人痛苦地死去的刺。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>South</highlight> America and sub-Saharan Africa are experiencing deforestation on an enormous scale: every year almost 5 million hectares are lost.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 南美洲和撒哈拉以南非洲正在经历大规模的森林砍伐：每年几乎有500万公顷的森林被砍伐。

examination_example.sentence: The wide diversity of Asian Americans was overlooked; there was very little mention of <highlight>South</highlight> Asians or Pacific Islanders, for example.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 亚裔美国人的多样性被忽视了; 例如，很少提到南亚人和太平洋岛民。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 南非的；南非人的；南非人

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

examination_example.sentence: We hired our bikes from the rental place at the <highlight>South</highlight> Gate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们从南门的租赁处租了自行车。

examination_example.sentence: Captain Scott had reached the <highlight>South</highlight> Pole early in 1912 but had died with his four companions on the march back.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 斯科特船长于1912年初到达南极，但在返回途中与他的四名同伴一同遇难。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

n. 东南；东南地区；（美国）东南部

word_family.mean: n. 南；南部；坐在南首位置的人；英格兰南部；美国南部各州；南方；南方不发达国家

examination_example.sentence: Among them, players from China, Japan and <highlight>South</highlight> Korea have the highest level of Weiqi.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其中，中日韩选手的围棋水平最高。

examination_example.sentence: The word “Katsudon” sounds similar to “winning?” in <highlight>South</highlight> Korea.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “卡苏顿”这个词听起来和“赢了" 相似吗？在韩国。

examination_example.sentence: Beautiful Valley Farm is at 395 Ribera <highlight>South</highlight> Road.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美丽山谷农场位于里贝拉南路395号。

examination_example.sentence: A pool runs from <highlight>south</highlight> to north through the garden of Pian Shi Shan Fang.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个水池从南到北穿过石山方花园。

examination_example.sentence: Capri is an island in the <highlight>south</highlight> of the country, famous for its beautiful coastline and a popular tourist destination (目的地).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 卡普里岛是该国南部的一个岛屿，以其美丽的海岸线和受欢迎的旅游目的地而闻名(目的地).

examination_example.sentence: Also, you can buy a small amount (数量) of fruit, such as a single apple or pear, each time in the <highlight>south</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 还有，可以少量购买的水果，如单个苹果或梨，每次在南方。

examination_example.sentence: Bird flew <highlight>south</highlight>, and Squirrel was nowhere around.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 鸟儿向南飞去，松鼠不在附近。

examination_example.sentence: In North America, millions of monarch butterflies fly <highlight>south</highlight> to spend the winter in Mexico, California and Florida, where it's warmer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在北美，数百万只黑脉金斑蝶飞往南方，在墨西哥、加利福尼亚和佛罗里达过冬，那里天气更暖和。

examination_example.sentence: In the winter there aren't any insects, so the birds fly <highlight>south</highlight> to southern Europe and Africa.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 冬天没有任何昆虫，所以鸟儿向南飞到南欧和非洲。
